conflicts.description: py-cryptography: some setuptools version are incompatible
conflicts.name: ^py-setuptools@74.0.0,74.1.0:74.1.3,75.0.0,75.1.0,75.2.0

dependencies.description:
Git is a free and open source distributed version control system
designed to handle everything from small to very large projects with
speed and efficiency.
dependencies.name: git

dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
dependencies.name: openssl

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: Python ASN.1 library with a focus on performance and a pythonic API
dependencies.name: py-asn1crypto

dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code
dependencies.name: py-cffi

dependencies.description: Internationalized Domain Names for Python (IDNA 2008 and UTS #46)
dependencies.name: py-idna

dependencies.description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.
dependencies.name: py-maturin

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
This package provides a unified command line interface to Amazon Web
Services.
dependent_to.name: awscli-v2

dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.
dependent_to.name: mongodb

dependent_to.description:
The ADAL for Python library makes it easy for python application to
authenticate to Azure Active Directory (AAD) in order to access AAD
protected web resources. DEPRECATED: replaced by MSAL Python.
dependent_to.name: py-adal

dependent_to.description:
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your
applications and systems easier to deploy.
dependent_to.name: py-ansible

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Command-Line Tools.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-cli

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Identity Library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-identity

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Client Libraries for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-keyvault

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Key Vault Keys Client Library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-keyvault-keys

dependent_to.description:
Microsoft Azure Storage Client Library for Python with multi API version
support.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-multiapi-storage

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage Client Library for Python
dependent_to.name: py-azure-storage-blob

dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Storage Common Client Library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-azure-storage-common

dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core

dependent_to.description: Globus SDK for Python
dependent_to.name: py-globus-sdk

dependent_to.description:
JWCrypto is an implementation of the Javascript Object Signing and
Encryption (JOSE) Web Standards as they are being developed in the JOSE
IETF Working Group and related technology. JWCrypto uses the
Cryptography package for all the crypto functions.
dependent_to.name: py-jwcrypto

dependent_to.description: Merlin Workflow for HPC.
dependent_to.name: py-merlin

dependent_to.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Python library enables
your app to access the Microsoft Cloud by supporting authentication of
users with Microsoft Azure Active Directory accounts (AAD) and Microsoft
Accounts (MSA) using industry standard OAuth2 and OpenID Connect.
dependent_to.name: py-msal

dependent_to.description:
A generic, spec-compliant, thorough implementation of the OAuth
request-signing logic
dependent_to.name: py-oauthlib

dependent_to.description:
Python-oracledb is the new name for the Python cx_Oracle driver. The
python-oracledb driver is an open source module that enables Python
programs to access Oracle Database.
dependent_to.name: py-oracledb

dependent_to.description: SSH2 protocol library
dependent_to.name: py-paramiko

dependent_to.description: JSON Web Token implementation in Python
dependent_to.name: py-pyjwt

dependent_to.description: Pure-Python MySQL client library
dependent_to.name: py-pymysql

dependent_to.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.
dependent_to.name: py-pyopenssl

dependent_to.description: Python SPNEGO authentication library.
dependent_to.name: py-pyspnego

dependent_to.description: An authentication handler for using Kerberos with Python Requests.
dependent_to.name: py-requests-kerberos

dependent_to.description:
This package allows for HTTP NTLM authentication using the requests
library.
dependent_to.name: py-requests-ntlm

dependent_to.description: Python bindings to FreeDesktop.org Secret Service API.
dependent_to.name: py-secretstorage

dependent_to.description: Python social authentication made simple.
dependent_to.name: py-social-auth-core

dependent_to.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.
dependent_to.name: py-urllib3

description:
cryptography is a package which provides cryptographic recipes and
primitives to Python developers
name: py-cryptography
